fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Unrest: Every time you end the phase with a full hand, satchel a random card in your hand.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Storm: Pick a room to appear in the next Night phase. [2 uses, 4 CD, Post-Mortem]
- Pressure: Pick a player. The next time they try to attack someone, they attack a random true Order member instead. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Pitchforks: Draw a random attacking card. [3 uses, 1 CD]
